attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite the media witch hunt there are those of us who belive in the prime ministers sound leadership.

I am 22 years old, a University student, and a single mum of two boys (4) and (2) I would not be at University if not for the leadership and policies of Gordon Brown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
